issue.title: Building Editor: Create hinged doors that open/close

content.raw: I've played around with hinged door models for my DRCSim work. I could make a hinged door model with the correct dimensions and make it the default door that gets used in the building editor. Though the physics may need some consideration (how heavy the door is and therefore how fast it opens/closes, etc).
content.html: I've played around with hinged door models for my DRCSim work. I could make a hinged door model with the correct dimensions and make it the default door that gets used in the building editor. Though the physics may need some consideration (how heavy the door is and therefore how fast it opens/closes, etc).
